ideas.idea_desc: An app that helps users find eco-friendly transportation options, such as carpooling, biking, or using public transit. The app also provides information on the carbon footprint of each mode of transportation.
A platform that connects local grocery stores with customers to reduce food waste by offering surplus food items at a discounted price.
A virtual reality platform that allows individuals to volunteer and experience different cultures and communities from the comfort of their own home.
An educational technology platform that integrates virtual reality, gamification, and artificial intelligence to enhance the learning experience for students.
An app that helps households track and reduce their waste by providing personalized recommendations on how to recycle and compost more effectively.
A platform that connects local shelters with volunteers to provide temporary housing for homeless individuals and families.
A mental health app that uses artificial intelligence and gamification to engage users in activities and exercises that promote well-being and stress relief.
A community-based gardening platform that connects local gardeners and promotes sustainable agriculture by sharing resources and knowledge.
An app that helps individuals track their carbon footprint and provides personalized recommendations on how to live a more environmentally friendly lifestyle.
An educational gaming platform that incorporates science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) subjects into fun and interactive games for children.
Here we create an IOT enabled smart city
Face detection in classrooms for attendance
